topic.title: Adding nodes to a cluster
topic.shortdesc: Add nodes to a cluster via the UI, CLI, or REST API interface.

body.p: There are a several methods for adding a node to a cluster. In each case, one or more nodes are marked to be added to the cluster, but it doesn't become an active member of the cluster until you rebalance the cluster.
In a CLI call, the rebalance can optionally be done while adding the new nodes. When using the UI, rebalancing requires an extra click.
When setting up a new Couchbase Server installation, you have the option to join the new node to an existing cluster.
